fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: -Select a target to interrogate them, learning if they are suspicious or not

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Everyone appears suspicious to you
-You also learn their exact role via a poem sent by the host (for the fun of it)
-This is mechanically a Town role in every way except for win condition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make the good faction lose (May win while dead)
